name: Bing at Night
description:
This is a WIP stylesheet for Bing. It's only been tested and set up for use in Google Chrome, at the moment there is no ETA on when I will make changes to support firefox or other browsers.

Why use bing? Microsoft Rewards points. This is just to make bing a bit more tolerable to use on a more regular basis.

user.name: CheatFreak47
user.about: I make userstyles that usually make sites easier to use or make them easier on the eyes.

additional_info: Current Progress Done(ish): Main Bing.Com Page Search Results Microsoft Rewards Dropdown Partially Done: Bing Images Bing Video (was already pretty dark so it was just small tweaks) Not Done (todo) All Settings Menus (possibly will do eventually) Changelog: [October 30th, 2:43 AM EST] -Changed name to Bing at Night, making it appear more professional because I'd say the theme is pretty good. -Moved ToDo to note section. [October 17th, 10:41 AM EST] -added speedtest text colors and fixed results page footer, todo: figure out canvas coloring [October 14th, 12:42 AM EST] -initial commit, lots done, lots to do, source is a total mess, but, that's alright.
